name: Quiz Realm
summary: Quizrealm is a new possibility for streamers to interact with their chat. It offers different types of quizzes. The question sets are split into different categories (General, Food, Sports, etc.). We constantly work on providing more questions for the game on top of user defind questions. Right now we provide 2 sets with a total of 400 questions. Depending on the quiz type the streamer duels against his chat or other streamers.
